title: Can you buy the first strike augment + bundle and the augment + bundle on the same day?
body: This would make it possible to get an extra gemstone from the event? Also can gemstones drop randomly from augment chests?

replies.body:
The augmented cache has a chance to drop a gemstone, similarly to normal hextech chests.  Per our [announcement page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/project-2016/content/crafting), the chest provide the following:

1 Skin Shard

2 PROJECT Cores

1 Loot Shard, which contains the equivalent of a normal hextech chest.  
- Includes a chance for an augment chest fragment
- Includes a chance for a gemstone

Regarding bundles, you may only receive one gemstone per day.  More information on this is also available at our [project ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ#h3)guide.

Hope that helps!
